objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Horror lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to education and learning in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about education and learning using neutral register
Students create original horror themed content about education and learning in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Horror story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in horror context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within horror theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
